alert.note: Alert for Crane; Ector; Loving; Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 11:46PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ECTOR... NORTHEASTERN REEVES...NORTHEASTERN WARD...SOUTHERN WINKLER... NORTHWESTERN CRANE AND SOUTHEASTERN LOVING COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Pyote, or 8 miles south of Wink, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Monahans, Kermit, Wink, Thorntonville, Pyote, Wickett, Penwell, Roy Hurd Memorial Airport, Monahans Sandhills State Park, and Winkler County Airport. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 51 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
